databases.name: Zacks Equity Prices
databases.description: Updated monthly, this back-testing database offers stock price history for over 28,000 active and dead tickers.  Daily close prices are available from 1987, volume from 1990, high and low prices are available from mid-1995, and open prices are available from mid-1999 forward.

databases.name: NYSE MKT (AMEX) Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all NYSE MKT stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: End of Day US Stock Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all publicly-traded US stocks. Updated daily. History to 1996. Quotemedia data.

databases.name: NASDAQ Stock Market Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all NASDAQ stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Toronto Stock Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all Toronto Stock Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: London Stock Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all London Stock Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Bombay Stock Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all Bombay Stock Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: New York Stock Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all New York Stock Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Hong Kong Stock Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all Hong Kong Stock Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Toronto Ventures Stock Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all Toronto Ventures Stock Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Shanghai Stock Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all Shanghai Stock Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Shenzhen Stock Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all Shenzhen Stock Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: National Stock Exchange of India Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all National Stock Exchange of India stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Wiki EOD Stock Prices
databases.description: End of day stock prices, dividends and splits for 3,000 US companies, curated by the Quandl community and released into the public domain.

databases.name: Chinese Stock Prices
databases.description: Updated daily, this database offers unadjusted and adjusted end of day stock prices for more than 2,800 Chinese public companies. Data history goes back to 2006.

databases.name: Federal Reserve Economic Data
databases.description: Growth, employment, inflation, labor, manufacturing and other US economic statistics from the research department of the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.

databases.name: United Nations International Financial Statistics
databases.description: This database offers comprehensive data on international financial indicators, such as average earnings, bond yields, government revenues and expenditures.

databases.name: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
databases.description: International organization of developed countries that promotes economic welfare. Collects data from members and others to make policy recommendations.

databases.name: US Equity Short Interest
databases.description: This data is generated from multiple sources. Short Interest is the number of shares sold and not yet repurchased.

databases.name: Yale Department of Economics
databases.description: Publishes data related to the stock and housing markets; price data for common indexes, interest rates, earnings, dividends, house prices, and CPI.

databases.name: London Stock Exchange
databases.description: Daily updated stock prices for the London Stock Exchange.

databases.name: World Bank Global Financial Development
databases.description: Data on financial system characteristics, including measures of size, use, access to, efficiency, and stability of financial institutions and markets.

databases.name: OTC Bulletin Board Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all OTC Bulletin Board stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Australian Securities Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all Australian Security Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Singapore Exchange Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all Singapore Exchange stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: OTC Markets Group Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all OTC Markets Group stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Japan Exchange Group Prices
databases.description: Professional-grade EOD stock prices, dividends, adjustments and splits for all Japan Exchange Group stocks. Updated daily. History to 2007. Data from Exchange Data International.

databases.name: Securities and Exchange Commission Filings
databases.description: Stock fundamentals and dividends data for almost all publicly listed companies, extracted from their SEC 10K and 10Q filings. Not harmonized.

databases.name: CryptoCoinChart
databases.description: Historical price data of crypto currencies.

databases.name: Core US Fundamentals Data
databases.description:
6,500+ companies, point-in-time, inc/exc restatements, active/delisted, up to 11 years 
history, 101 indicators, expanding coverage, daily updates.

databases.name: Unicorn Research Corporation
databases.description: Advance and decline data for the NYSE, AMEX, and NASDAQ stock exchanges. From various publicly-available sources and the median value is reported.

databases.name: YFinance
databases.description: Historical stock price data validated against prices published on Yahoo Finance.  Please note: Data is not sourced from Yahoo.com

databases.name: World Federation of Exchanges
databases.description: A trade association of sixty publicly regulated stock, futures, and options exchanges that publishes data for its exchanges, like market capitalization.

databases.name: Core India Fundamentals Data
databases.description: This database offers up to 11 years of history for 165+ essential fundamental indicators and financial ratios for more than 4,000 Indian public companies.

databases.name: Deutsche Bundesbank Data Repository
databases.description: Data on the German economy, money and capital markets, public finances, banking, households, Euro-area aggregates, trade and external debt.

databases.name: PRICE-DATA.COM
databases.description: Historical futures prices from the Tokyo Stock Price Index.

databases.name: National Bureau of Economic Research
databases.description: A private research organization providing economic research to inform businesses, policy-makers, and academia. Economic indicators in the U.S. and the world.

databases.name: Asian Development Bank
databases.description: Key development indicators (GDP, GNI, etc.) for countries in Asia and the Pacific.

databases.name: Groningen Growth and Development Centre
databases.description: GGDC provides data on sectoral productivity in many countries, including data on indicators such as output-side and expenditure-side GDP.

databases.name: U.S. Department of Agriculture NASS
databases.description: The National Agricultural Statistics Service data on nearly every aspect of the U.S. agricultural industry; production, prices, labor and wages, finances, etc.

databases.name: Archival Federal Reserve Economic Data
databases.description: ALFRED® provides vintage versions of historical economic data.

databases.name: European Central Bank
databases.description: The central bank for the European Union oversees monetary policy and the Euro, and provides data on related macroeconomic variables.

databases.name: U.S. Energy Information Administration Data
databases.description: US national and state data on production, consumption and other indicators on all major energy products, such as electricity, coal, natural gas and petroleum.

databases.name: Free US Fundamentals Data
databases.description: Free US fundamentals: 7 years of annual history for 2,000+ companies. Enter code at checkout for 100% off: VINPAV-100P-HWNT_SF0

databases.name: Google Finance
databases.description:
This data is NOT sourced directly from Google.  It is however verified against their numbers.

www.quandl.com/WIKI is a better source.

databases.name: Zacks Fundamentals Collection A
databases.description: Updated daily, this database contains over 70 fundamental indicators for over 10,000 US Equities, including 4,000+ delisted stocks.

databases.name: Zacks Fundamentals Collection B
databases.description: Updated daily, this database contains over 200 fundamental indicators for over 10,000 US Equities, including 4,000+ delisted stocks.

databases.name: Zacks Target Price History
databases.description: Updated monthly, this database offers target price history for over 5000 publicly traded companies.

databases.name: Financial Industry Regulatory Authority
databases.description: Financial Industry Regulatory Authority provides short interest data on securities firms and exchange markets.

databases.name: European Commission Annual Macro-Economic Database
databases.description: Annual macro-economic database of the European Commission's Directorate General for Economic and Financial Affairs (DG ECFIN).

databases.name: PortfolioEffect Volatility and Risk Factors
databases.description: Updated daily, this database offers data on volatility and other risk factors for 8,000+ financial instruments, including stocks, stock indices and ETFs.

databases.name: United Kingdom Office of National Statistics
databases.description: Data on employment, investment, housing, household expenditure, national accounts, and many other socioeconomic indicators in the United Kingdom.

databases.name: Australian Bureau of Statistics
databases.description: Australia's national statistical agency provides socioeconomic and financial data on the country to the public and different levels of government.

databases.name: National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies (France)
databases.description: INSEE is the national statistical agency of France. It collects data on France's economy and society, such as socioeconomic indicators and national accounts.

databases.name: PortfolioEffect Risk and Performance Metrics
databases.description: Updated daily, this database offers data on risk and performance metrics for 8,000+ financial instruments, including stocks, stock indices and ETFs.

databases.name: PsychSignal Social Media Sentiment Data
databases.description: Updated daily, this database offers sentiment data for more than 10,000 financial market products, including stocks, ETFs, futures, currencies, and bitcoin.

databases.name: US Federal Reserve Data Releases
databases.description: Official US figures on money supply, interest rates, mortgages, government finances, bank assets and debt, exchange rates, industrial production.

databases.name: BraveNewCoin Regional Indexes
databases.description: Updated daily, this database contains historic global price indexes for a number of cryptocurrencies, as calculated by Brave New Coin.

databases.name: EventVestor Corporate Buybacks
databases.description: Stock buyback announcements data for over 4,000 US listed companies provided by EventVestor. Updated daily, this database includes history to 2007.

databases.name: Core2 Trading Signals
databases.description: The Core2 Stock Trading Signals are provided daily for the S&P 500  as 3 distinct signals: Short term signal, Mid Term signal, and Long Term Signal.  Each signal indicates the expected price momentum for that time period.

databases.name: Quantcha Option Analytics
databases.description: Over 70 EOD option analytics updated daily for over 2,500 US equities, including put/call ratios, forward prices, and option breakevens with history back to 2002.

databases.name: Zillow Real Estate Research
databases.description: Home prices and rents by size, type and tier; housing supply, demand and sales; sliced by zip code, neighbourhood, city, metro area, county and state.

databases.name: Penn World Table
databases.description: Provides purchasing power parity, national income accounts converted to international prices, income, population, productivity for 167 countries.

databases.name: Chinese Corporate Actions
databases.description: Updated daily, this database offers data on corporate actions including dividends, reforms, allotments, daily returns, and IPOs for more than 2,800 companies in China. Data history goes back to 1992.

databases.name: Bank of Japan
databases.description: The Bank of Japan is responsible for monetary policy and the national currency (yen), and providing data on key macroeconomic variables.

databases.name: Core China Fundamentals Data
databases.description: Updated daily, this database offers data for 150 essential fundamental indicators and financial ratios for more than 2,915 Chinese public companies. Data history goes back to 2006.

databases.name: Bank of Mexico
databases.description: The Bank of Mexico is responsible for monetary policy and the national currency (peso), and provides data on accounts and all macroeconomic variables.

databases.name: Central Bank of Brazil Statistical Database
databases.description: Brazilian macroeconomic data, covering public finances, national accounts, payment systems, inflation, exchange rates, trade, and international reserves.

databases.name: Swiss National Bank
databases.description: Central bank responsible for monetary policy and currency. Data on international accounts, interest rates, money supply, and other macroeconomic indicators.

databases.name: London Metal Exchange
databases.description: The London Metal Exchange is the world centre for industrial metals trading.

databases.name: British Petroleum
databases.description: BP is a large energy producer and distributor. It provides data on energy production and consumption in individual countries and larger subregions.

databases.name: Johnson Matthey
databases.description: A leading provider of current and historical data on platinum group metals such as prices, supply, and demand.

databases.name: IMF Cross Country Macroeconomic Statistics
databases.description: IMF primary commodity prices and world economic outlook data, published by Open Data for Africa. Excellent cross-country macroeconomic data.

databases.name: Reserve Bank of Australia
databases.description: Central bank and monetary authority, regulates banking industry, sets interest rates, and services government's debt. Data on key economic indicators.

databases.name: China Macroeconomic and Industrial Data
databases.description: Updated daily, this database offers Chinese macroeconomic data, plus more than 1,600 sector-specific industrial indicators for 22 different sectors in China. Data history goes back to 1998.

databases.name: Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia
databases.description: The FRBP is a regional central bank for the Federal Reserve. It publishes data on business confidence indexes, GDP, consumption, and other economic indicators.

databases.name: World Bank Global Economic Monitor
databases.description: Data on global economic developments, with coverage of high-income, as well as developing countries.

databases.name: World Bank World Development Indicators
databases.description: Most current and accurate development indicators, compiled from officially-recognized international sources.

databases.name: BLS Inflation & Prices
databases.description: US national and state-level inflation data, published by the Bureau of Labor Statistics.

databases.name: Indian Equities Adjusted End of Day Prices
databases.description: Professionally curated EOD stock prices adjusted for cash dividends, stock dividends, stock splits, rights issues and demergers for all CNX500 index companies.

databases.name: Trading Economics
databases.description: Comprehensive, harmonized macroeconomic statistics for over 200 countries. 7000+ indicators from 1000+ sources, updated hourly.

databases.name: National Bureau of Statistics of China
databases.description: Statistics of China relating to finance, industry, trade, agriculture, real estate, and transportation.

databases.name: Economena Middle East Financial Sector Data
databases.description: This database offers 1700+ economic indicators for 9 countries in the Middle East & North Africa. Data are sourced from central banks and statistical agencies.

databases.name: Freddie Mac
databases.description: Data from Freddie Mac’s Primary Mortgage Market Survey and other region specific historical mortgage rates.

databases.name: National Association of Homebuilders
databases.description: A trade association in housing, home-ownership, and residential buildings. Data on opportunity indexes and related economic indicators for the US.

databases.name: Singularity
databases.description: Ray Kurzweil's Singularity group publishes data related to technological innovation and advancement; Prices, computing power, Internet use.

databases.name: Labour Bureau Government of India
databases.description: The Indian Bureau of Labour's consumer price index for industrial workers.

databases.name: Perth Mint
databases.description: The Perth Mint’s highs, lows and averages of interest rates and commodities prices, updated on a monthly basis.

databases.name: Bank of Canada Statistical Database
databases.description: Economic, financial and banking data for Canada. Includes interest rates, inflation, national accounts and more.  Daily updates.

databases.name: Bitcoin Average
databases.description: BitcoinAverage's Bitcoin Price Index is an average rate of all integrated exchanges, weighted by trading volume.

databases.name: United Nations Global Indicators
databases.description: This database offers a wide range of global indicators, covering population, public health, employment, trade, education, inflation and external debt.

databases.name: London Bullion Market Association
databases.description: An international trade association in the London gold and silver market, consisting of central banks, private investors, producers, refiners, and other agents.

databases.name: MeasuringWorth
databases.description: Data on economic indicators for a variety of countries covering GDP, inflation, population, and other major indicators. Vetted by distinguished researchers.

databases.name: Stoxx
databases.description: Euro Currency price indices.

databases.name: Institute for Supply Management
databases.description: ISM promotes supply-chain management practices and publishes data on production and supply chains, new orders, inventories, and capital expenditures.

databases.name: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
databases.description: Comprehensive global data on food and agriculture. Data covers production, consumption, price inices, export and import of hundreds of agricultural products.

databases.name: Blockchain
databases.description: Blockchain is a website that publishes data related to Bitcoin, updated daily.

databases.name: Wall Street Journal
databases.description: Price data for commodities including agricultural products, metals, and energy, in different regions of the world.

databases.name: European Energy Exchange
databases.description: This database provides data on the PHELIX power futures for Germany operated by EEX Power Derivatives GmbH.
